search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SendFox (sendfox.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for SendFox can be found here: [https://sendfox.com/pricing](https://sendfox.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.
